_header: Evarist the holy pope so I understand
Subjects: Evarist, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St Evarist, in one MS of the South English Legendary — in couplets

Bod779.First Lines:
Euarist þe holy pope so ich ondirstondewas I bore by syde
                    Ierusalem in þat ilke londe…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…& þat he bere oure erande to god oure alþer
                    kingeÞat to þe ioye of heuene he vs alle bringe
Bod779.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Des Ms. Bodl. 779 jüngere Zusatzlegenden zur südlichen
                Legendensammlung.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         82 (1889): 307-422: 346-8.
